properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 18 at 9:00AM CST until January 20 at 12:40PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Sucarnoochee River At
Livingston...

.Water levels remain elevated on the Sucarnoochee River at
Livingston due to recent rainfall. However...levels will
begin a slow fall this morning and continue to fall. Minor
flooding will continue along the river for the next couple
of days.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Sucarnoochee River At Livingston.
* until Monday afternoon...or until the Warning is cancelled.
* AT  8:30 AM Saturday the stage was 21.8 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 18 feet.
* Forecast...The river will begin to slowly fall late this morning.
The river will fall below flood stage early Monday morning.
* Impact...At 21 feet...Overflow of low-lying acricultural lands
increases. Cattle and farm equipment should be moved to higher
ground. At 18 feet...Flooding of farm lands around Livinsgton
occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Sunday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
